verses.verse: שִׁ֖יר <WH7892> A Song מִזְמ֣וֹר <WH4210> [or] Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David נָכ֣וֹן <WH3559> is fixed לִבִּ֣י <WH3820> my heart אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> O God אָשִׁ֥ירָה <WH7891> I will sing וַ֝אֲזַמְּרָ֗ה <WH2167> and give praise אַף־ <WH637> even כְּבוֹדִֽי׃ <WH3519> even with my glory
ע֭וּרָֽה <WH5782> Awake הַנֵּ֥בֶל <WH5035> psaltery וְכִנּ֗וֹר <WH3658> and harp אָעִ֥ירָה <WH5782> I [myself] will awake שָּֽׁחַר׃ <WH7837> early

אוֹדְךָ֖ <WH3034> I will praise בָעַמִּ֥ים ׀ <WH5971> among the people יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> thee O LORD וַ֝אֲזַמֶּרְךָ֗ <WH2167> and I will sing praises בַּל־ <WH1077> among אֻמִּֽים׃ <WH3816> unto thee among the nations

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גָד֣וֹל <WH1419> [is] great מֵֽעַל־ <WH5921> and שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> above the heavens חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH2617> For thy mercy וְֽעַד־ <WH5704> to שְׁחָקִ֥ים <WH7834> [reacheth] unto the clouds אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH571> and thy truth

ר֣וּמָה <WH7311> Be thou exalted עַל־ <WH5921> above שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> above the heavens אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> O God וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> above כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> above all the earth כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3519> and thy glory

לְ֭מַעַן <WH4616> because of יֵחָלְצ֣וּן <WH2502> may be delivered יְדִידֶ֑יךָ <WH3039> That thy beloved הוֹשִׁ֖יעָה <WH3467> save יְמִֽינְךָ֣ <WH3225> [with] thy right hand וַעֲנֵֽנִי׃ <WH6030> and answer

אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ <WH430> God דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> hath spoken בְּקָדְשׁ֗וֹ <WH6944> in his holiness אֶעְלֹ֥זָה <WH5937> I will rejoice אֲחַלְּקָ֥ה <WH2505> I will divide שְׁכֶ֑ם <WH7927> Shechem וְעֵ֖מֶק <WH6010> the valley סֻכּ֣וֹת <WH5523> of Succoth אֲמַדֵּֽד׃ <WH4058> and mete out

לִ֤י גִלְעָ֨ד ׀ <WH1568> Gilead לִ֤י מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <WH4519> [is] mine Manasseh וְ֭אֶפְרַיִם <WH669> [is] mine Ephraim מָע֣וֹז <WH4581> also [is] the strength רֹאשִׁ֑י <WH7218> of mine head יְ֝הוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> Judah מְחֹקְקִֽי׃ <WH2710> [is] my lawgiver

מוֹאָ֤ב ׀ <WH4124> Moab סִ֬יר <WH5518> caldron רַחְצִ֗י <WH7366> is My washbowl עַל־ <WH5921> Over אֱ֭דוֹם <WH123> over Edom אַשְׁלִ֣יךְ <WH7993> will I cast out נַעֲלִ֑י <WH5275> my shoe עֲלֵֽי־ <WH5921> Over פְ֝לֶ֗שֶׁת <WH6429> over Philistia אֶתְרוֹעָֽע׃ <WH7321> will I triumph
מִ֣י <WH4310> Who יֹ֭בִלֵנִי <WH2986> Who will bring עִ֣יר <WH5892> Ai מִבְצָ֑ר <WH4013> me into the strong מִ֖י <WH4310> Who נָחַ֣נִי <WH5148> will lead עַד־ <WH5704> against אֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> Edom

הֲלֹֽא־ <WH3808> O אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> [Wilt] not [thou] O God זְנַחְתָּ֑נוּ <WH2186> [who] hast cast us off וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> not תֵצֵ֥א <WH3318> go forth אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> ? and wilt not thou O God בְּצִבְאֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH6635> our armies
הָֽבָה־ <WH3051> Give לָּ֣נוּ עֶזְרָ֣ת <WH5833> us help מִצָּ֑ר <WH6862> from trouble וְ֝שָׁ֗וְא <WH7723> for vain תְּשׁוּעַ֥ת <WH8668> [is] the help אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of man
בֵּֽאלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> Through God נַעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> we shall do חָ֑יִל <WH2428> valiantly וְ֝ה֗וּא <WH1931> who יָב֥וּס <WH947> for he [it is that] shall tread down צָרֵֽינוּ׃ <WH6862> our enemies
